## Loading the datasets

```{r}
here::i_am("DM-Project-Marechal-Volaris.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
counties <- vroom("county_complete.csv")
med_coverage <- vroom("ahrf2023.csv")
covid <- vroom("coronavirus-covid-19-pandemic-usa-counties.csv")
```
